metadata.name: Sky Fire
metadata.description:
Sky Fire is a 1/1 endless loop of serenity. 

As I carefully laid flat on the ground, to keep my eye line with that of the camera, I guided my drone through this small gap to reveal one of the most beautiful sunsets I have ever witnessed. 

In life, we often find ourselves stuck in the shadows. Sometimes all that is needed is to take the leap of faith to find peace on the horizon.  Let this video take you on a visual journey out of the shadows to a state of reverie.

4k H.264
35°17'14" S 149°5'39" E
